definition: Taoist or Buddhist rite/abbr. for 菩提道場|菩提道场[Pu2 ti2 dao4 chang3]

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
Bodhimanda (place of enlightenment associated with a Bodhisattva)

sentences.english: This is the straight mind, this is our practice in the dojo.
sentences.chinese: 这便是直心，这才是我们修行的道场。

sentences.english: A woman once brought her husband, an OB/ GYN , to the temple.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，有个居士带着她妇产科医生的先生到道场来。

sentences.english: It is storied that Mahasthamaprapta preached in Putuo Mount of Zhejiang.
sentences.chinese: 相传其显灵说法的道场在浙江普陀山。

sentences.english: We also protect all cultivators , so that their Bodhimandas are peaceful and they attain fearlessness.
sentences.chinese: 我亦保护是修行人，安立道场，得无所畏。

sentences.english: Lei Yue Mun Children Class shall resume normal training with immediate effect.
sentences.chinese: 鲤鱼门道场儿童班由即日开始回复正常操练。

sentences.english: Dao can develop objects, and a Dao field is a Dao space with the function of development.
sentences.chinese: 道可以运化事物，道场是具有运化功能的道空间。

sentences.english: Surface at sea painting Buddhist temple in a religious painting when hung.
sentences.chinese: 水陆画是在佛寺举行水路道场时悬挂的一种宗教画。

definition: to pass on doctrines from master to disciple (Buddhism)
one of three fabled islands in Eastern sea, abode of immortals
square zhang (i.e. unit of area 10 feet square)/monastic room 10 feet square/Buddhist or Daoist abbot/abbot's chamber
founder (of a craft, religious sect etc)
Lingshan county in Qinzhou 欽州|钦州[Qin1 zhou1], Guangxi
